item.title: Optimal Regression Design
item.description: Objective This tutorial introduces optimal regression design in the context of ordinary least squares (OLS). The goal is to strategically select the input values (design points) that yield the most precise and efficient estimates of regression parameters. \[ y = \beta_0 + \beta_1 x + \varepsilon, \quad \varepsilon \sim N(0, \sigma^2) \] What is optimal design? In the regression context, optimal design refers to selecting design points that optimize a statistical criterion.
